title: Don't Die
headline: An online lighthouse for people who feel lost, voiceless, and powerless working in creative industries and enduring the social internet.
description: Don’t Die is a collection of 600+ interviews preserved by Stanford that aims to tell the story of how we are trying to come to grips with early 21st century life. I worked with Don’t Die’s creator, writer and journalist David Wolinsky to redesign the Don’t Die platform. I conducted user interviews, client workshops, and led its visual rebrand.
